alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 2:21AM CDT until April 01 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COLBERT...NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN AND NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 221 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Littleville, or 10 miles northeast of Russellville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Moulton, Town Creek, Leighton, Courtland, North Courtland, Mt Hope, La Grange, Tharptown, Ne Smith and Wren. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
